questions.quote: Yeah, that's okay, I mean if you guys all have to go away for the first weekend I'm alone by myself, y'know then I totally, totally understand.
...run it all over your body until you're... trembling with... with...
You tell your friend Chandler that we're definately broken up this time.
Well, he did this bit... You probably had to be there, but it was Liza Minelli locked in our freezer, eating a raw chicken.
Wait, did you get to the part about his 'huge throbbing pens'? Tell ya, you don't wanna be around when he starts writing with those!
Ooh, actually I've been making a list of all the women I know who might be into doing this!
That's right, he's not Drake, he's Hans Remore, Drake's evil twin.
Well, okay. You were my girlfriend and we were doing the crossword puzzle. Y'know like you guys were doing last night. So, that's it. I'm in love with Monica and I'll be moving out.
I think we'd better start again. Ross, repeat after me. I, Ross...
They wouldn't have put it there if it didn't do something! How can you not care?
